channel.title: typescript on Dev Blog
channel.description: Recent content in typescript on Dev Blog

item.title: Deno
item.description: For the fifth implementation, I have chosen to use Deno, a JavaScript runtime and competitor to Node.js. I’ve been avoiding a JavaScript/TypeScript implementation because I frankly don’t like JavaScript or Node very much, so when I was reminded of Deno I thought I’d give it a shot. Thoughts on Deno Overall, I quite enjoyed the UX. Deno supports TypeScript out of the box with no headache configuring Babel or webpack or what have you.
